name: cloudflare-static-deployer
description: A web application for deploying static websites to Cloudflare

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build:frontend && cd frontend && npm run pages:deploy
scripts.deploy:workers: npm run build:backend && cd backend && npm run wrangler:deploy
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:pages && npm run deploy:workers
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist
scripts.validate: cd frontend && npm run validate:static && cd ../backend && npm run workers:validate
